text: The @US_FDA advisory panel recommended use of the mRNA #vaccine Tozinameran! #DYK it codes for the SARS-CoV-2 Spike glycoprotein with 2 point mutations (K986P and V987P) in the central helix domain to lock it in an antigenically preferred prefusion conformation. #pdb50 #COVID19 https://t.co/yPLJEKVYVP
